body:
Chapter 2134 - Chapter 2134: Dragon! Fusion! Realm! (1)

Chapter 2134: Dragon! Fusion! Realm! (1)

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

“What is he up to?”

Originally, it was already unbelievable that Hallmaster Dao and Sword Saint Rao were forced to flee by Xu Xiaoshou.

Unexpectedly, Xu Xiaoshou did not chase after them, but only raised his hand instantly. There was a subtle expression on his face.

His sly smile as if he enjoyed himself immensely was even more unfathomable.

“He’s not planning to play the game of ‘I’ll let you run for Ten Auras, right?

Hiss, this is a little disgusting!”

“That’s right, Little Xu… He only inherited the power of a Holy Emperor, what’s there to preen about?”

“I can do it too. I can do it!”

“Stop bragging. You’re up to it? The moment the Holy Emperor’s power entered your body, you would explode! You’re not even qualified to be a host body, and you want to compare yourself to Lord Shou?”

“No, I can’t stand it anymore. Hallmaster Dao’s battle was too intense!”

“Then you’ll go?”

“Li Fugui, right? I’ve really tolerated you for a long time… Uh, why is it a little hot?”

“Wait, something’s wrong, white flame! Infernal white flame!”

Everyone was still in a discussion when they suddenly heard a Pfft sound. They all pointed at each other in surprise.

The temperature in the First Hall of Sins increased drastically!

White flames rose from the buildings, the cracks in the ground, the vegetation, and human bodies. This phenomenon was beyond explanation.

A burning pain followed…

They were clearly outside the battlefield. Xu Xiaoshou seemed to have lost his sense of propriety and was about to throw everyone into the sea of fire.

The Spiritual Cultivators who watched the battle panicked. They tried to extinguish the flames on their bodies, but it was as if they used firewood to put out a fire. Their spiritual sources were ignited.

Those who tried to use the power of the Path Principles to put out the white flames ignited the Path Principles around them instead.

“F*ck! I’m burning!”

“Me too. I’m burning up…”

“How do we get rid of these white flames? I’ve heard that we can use the banishment technique; use the Great Path to wrap up the infernal white flames and throw it out…But why is it not working?”

“Brother, this is the white flame of the Holy Emperor!”

Pfft! Pfft!

The strange sound grew louder and echoed in all directions. The ground shook violently.

Soon, a pure white Ember Heart leaped out from the top of Xu Xiaoshou’s head, and the entire Abyss Island seemed to have been placed in an oven.

Boom!

White pillars of fire rose into the sky from the First Hall of Sins.

A person who stood next to the pillar of fire was sent flying instantly and his entire body was set ablaze.

Even though he used all of his strength, the white flames were like maggots that could not be expelled from his bones.

“Ahhhhh!”

Screams and wails filled the air.

It was not only in the First Hall of Sins, but also in the Desolate Inferno Domain, Sleeping Valley, Blood World, Fallen Abyss, and so on.

There were loud rumbles that echoed all over Abyss Island and a heavenly flame shot into the sky.

This bright white flame was even more dazzling than the 365 Void Suppression Stele’s eight core spiritual and Holy Light.

In terms of numbers, they completely crushed them!

“He, he wants to…”

Everyone seemed to awaken from a dream. They realized that Xu Xiaoshou, who had the Holy Emperor’s power, didn’t need to chase after them.

His vision covered the entire Abyss Island. As long as he attacked, everything would be within his attack range.

How could Dao Qiongcang and Rao Yaoyao escape from Xu Xiaoshou?

“Boom boom boom…”

The pillars of fire that shot out from the space and the ground pursued Dao Qiongcang.

Even though Dao Qiongcang and Rao Yaoyao had split up, he could still see with his saint’s will that Rao Yaoyao suffered the same fate.

Xu Xiaoshou stopped where he was. As far as his eyes could see, the entire island was covered in flames as he chased the Saints away!

“Is he crazy?”

Dao Qiongcang was confused.

He knew that Xu Xiaoshou had obtained the Mystery Boxes and had the ability to modify them so he could avoid the death countdown.

However, the mystery boxes could only dodge the Perception of the Way of the Heavens!

This was evasion, not immunity!

Its principle was to reduce a big matter to a small one, and transform a small matter into nothing. With the help of the Divine Secret, it would treat the destruction within a certain range as if nothing had happened.

But now…

Such a large-scale destruction covered the entire island.

No matter how strong the Mystery Boxes were, they could not avoid such an anomaly!

If Xu Xiaoshou attacked in this manner, he would definitely be targeted by the Abyss Island Spirit. Had he gone crazy and sought his death? What was he doing?

Unless…

“Unless there were no restrictions on his attacks, and he obtained the Heavenly Ancestor Legacy that Bei Huai mentioned before, and it is currently in progress?”

Dao Qiongcang’s pupils constricted when he thought of this answer.

This meant that many of his plans had to be stopped in time!

If Xu Xiaoshou was also recognized by the will of the Heavenly Ancestor, his danger level would be raised to the highest level!

“Bazhun’an, Bei Huai, Xu Xiaoshou…”

“Other than the Heavenly Ancestor’s Blessing that was scattered outside and

obtained by the two of them, there’s only one left. It’s in the Zhen Huang

Palace.”

“Void Crystals are difficult to come by and there’s a talent limit to exchange them for the Heavenly Ancestor’s Blessing. No one had been able to successfully exchange for that so far.”

“Xu Xiaoshou’s talent had been recognized and exchanged?” At this moment, the white wall of fire blocked Dao Qiongcang.

He was besieged from all sides!

Even the Great Path was ignited!

To cross over, even the space-time attribute was a little difficult, let alone the Divine Secret?

At this moment, Dao Qiongcang, who was still in shock, finally couldn’t help but turn around and look into the distance, at that dangerous person.

He had fled to the Sleeping Valley.

From afar, he saw Xu Xiaoshou, who stood above the sea of fire in the First Hall of Sins with both his hands raised high.

Xu Xiaoshou was laughing hysterically. It was obvious that he had suffered a mental breakdown due to the immense strength.

However, there was still a touch of disdain on his face that he had previously shown. It was as if he was a cat that played with a mouse as he watched Rao Yaoyao and himself flee in such a sorry state.

This fellow, this expression…

It could indeed be said that after he obtained this power, the villain became successful and was as annoying as a nouveau riche.

However, at a certain moment, Dao Qiongcang caught a glimpse of a young Bazhun’an amid that lawless manner..
